resource-agent.name: fence_epsr2

symlink.name: fence_epsr2
symlink.shortdesc: Fence agent for ePowerSwitch R2 and newer

resource-agent.longdesc:
fence_epsr2 is a Power Fencing agent which can be used with the ePowerSwitch 8M+ power switch to fence connected machines. It ONLY works on 8M+ devices, as they support the hidden page feature.
The agent works by connecting to the hidden page and pass the appropriate arguments to GET request. This means, that the hidden page feature must be enabled and properly configured.
NOTE: In most cases you want to use fence_epsr2, as fence_eps only works with older hardware.
